title: Advanced matplotlib tutorial with library author John Hunter
summary:
In this video tutorial from the 2012 PyData Workshop, John Hunter, author of
matplotlib is going to give you some advanced insight into the plotting
library.
description:
John's tutorial will focus on broader topics concerning a wide set of users,
including:

  * customization 
  * configuration 
  * event handling 
  * interacting with figures 
  * tips & tricks
